entries.name: Properties
entries: Forging Conditions: Requires a 4th level Graviturgy Spell and 17 Con. Gravity Quartz is Smithed with CON not STR.

Armor Effects: The Armors weight is quadrupled but its AC is increased by +1. As an action you can double the weight of the armor. While doubled you gain an additional +1 AC but your speed is reduced by 10 feet and you have disadvantage on Dexterity based attack rolls.

Weapon Effects: The weapons weight is quadrupled. Its damage die increases by one. As an action you can double the weight of the weapon to increase the weapons die by an additional step. When you do this you have disadvantage on all Dexterity saving throws and Dexterity ability checks.
Additional Effects: Suitable material for Titanic Plate.
